DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , open-label , inpatient/outpatient , fixed-sequence study examine effect multiple dose bitopertin single dos Midazolam healthy volunteer . A single oral dose Midazolam ( 7.5 mg ) administer Day 1 overnight fast . Daily oral dos bitopertin give fed condition Days 2-13 fasting Day 14 . Oral dos bitopertin Midazolam ( 7.5 mg ) co-administered Day 15 , overnight fast . Pharmacokinetics assess throughout . Total time treatment expect 15 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Exmining Effect Multiple Doses Bitopertin Single Dose Pharmacokinetics Midazolam Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer , 18 65 year age , inclusive . A BMI 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive . Healthy determine Investigator basis medical/surgical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Female participant must use effective contraception define protocol pregnant breastfeeding Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day Must able refrain smoking inpatient stay Personal family history congenital long QT syndrome family history sudden death Any major illness within 4 week prior dose acute disease state within 7 day prior study start History alcoholism , drug abuse addiction within last year prior study start , suspicion drug abuse/addiction alcohol use prior study start Current alcohol consumption average 24 g alcohol per day Any significant allergic reaction drug , multiple allergy judgment Investigator
